alert.note: Alert for Alcorn (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 3:46PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Alcorn, McNairy and southwestern Hardin Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 346 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Selmer, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, Savannah, Selmer, Big Hill Pond State Park, Adamsville, Shiloh, McNairy, Farmington, Bethel Springs, Eastview, Michie, Guys, Ramer, Stantonville, Forty Forks, Rose Creek, Good Hope, Pebble Hill, Hamburg and Wenasoga. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
